item.title: Write and publish your first Elixir library
item.description: As some of you have heard lately, Elixir is the new hotness. Is it just hype? Well, I thought so at first, but I told myself “heck, even if it’s a waste of time, at least I’ll broaden my horizons”. Which, if you think about it, it not really is a waste of time. Long story short, after couple of weeks of fiddling with the language, mostly by playing with it’s web framework I am delighted to say that it’s a really cool language that you should try out and also, I published a really small API wrapper for Elixir.
